item.title: Farmers protest ethanol plant in Telangana's Gadwal, set fire to company equipment
item.description:
<![CDATA[Follow TNM's WhatsApp channel for news updates and story links.
Residents of Pedda Dhanwada and surrounding villages in Telangana’s Jogulamba Gadwal district damaged the worksite of a company on June 4, Wednesday, protesting the establishment of an ethanol plant.
Farmers from surrounding villages gathered in large numbers and allegedly damaged the vehicles of the company setting up the plant. They also allegedly set fire to tents and a container, and chased after the company’s employees. No in...]]>
item.author: Tnm Staff
